text:
@brhodes President Moon Jae-in was prepared to handle the novel coronavirus. Moon is a wise leader. He saved South Korean lives. 

Donald Trump was more concerned with his reelection, making a profit  and golfing.  Donald Trump is not wise. 100,000  Americans deaths.
